covidphtext 0.2.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Description

covidphtext

Utilities to Extract Text Data From COVID-19-Related Resolutions and Policies from the Philippines

Extract

get_iatf_links()

Get list of links to IATF resolutions from Department of Health website

get_iatf_gazette()

Get list of links to IATF resolutions from Philippines Official Gazette

get_iatf_pdf()

Get a specific IATF resolution PDF file

Combine

combine_docs()

Combine specific documents available in the covidphtext package into a single dataset

combine_iatf()

Combine all Inter-Agency Task Force for the management of emerging infectious diseases (IATF) resolutions datasets into a single dataset

IATF Datasets

iatfLinks

IATF resolutions URLs

iatfLinksGazette

IATF resolutions URLs from the Official Gazette
